screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of an Android smartphone. At the top, there is a Google search bar and a microphone icon for voice search. Below the search bar, there are quick access icons for Newegg, Walmart, Amazon, and Target. Further down, there are shortcuts to Photos, Maps, Gmail, Clock, and Settings.
action_think: The user wants to view the shopping cart on Newegg. Since the shopping cart icon is not visible on the current screen, the user should be instructed to search for Newegg using the search bar.
action_plan: Search for Newegg using the Google search bar
Click on the Newegg icon to access the Newegg website
action_result: The last action of clicking on the Newegg app at the top-left has brought you to the Newegg app's home screen. You can now see various categories such as "Computer Parts, PC Components," "GPU's / Video Graphics Cards," "Components & Storage," and "Today's Best Deals." This action is relevant to your request because the shopping cart is typically located within the app's navigation menu or the "My Cart" section, which is not visible in the current screenshot but can often be found in the app's main menu. To find the shopping cart, you may need to swipe up or tap on the menu icon (usually three horizontal lines) located at the top-left corner of the app screen.
